explains: n. 孤儿院；<古>孤儿身份，孤儿状态

sentences.cn: 她参观了泰国的一家孤儿院。

sentences.en: More likely, I was dropped at the orphanage steps or somewhere else.
sentences.cn: 更有可能的是，我被扔在孤儿院的台阶上或别的地方。

sentences.en: Finally, at the orphanage, Pineda began to receive support and encouragement.
sentences.cn: 最后，在孤儿院，皮涅达开始得到支持和鼓励。
